result.execSummary:
The defendant Eron W. Gorr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Eron W. Gorr in court with attorney Jessica L Schuster.  Defendant Eron W. Gorr in custody.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls 15CF21 and 15CM18 @ 10:04 a.m. Statement of negotiated plea filed. Def will plead to charge in 15CF21, 2 yrs prison, 1 yr initial, 1 yr ext supv., AODA and costs, concurrent to all other sentences. 15CM18 dismiss and read in. Counsel and Def agree.15CF21 - Def will waive prelim. Court reviews prelim rights, finds waiver freely made, finds probable cause and binds over. Information filed, reading waived. Enhancer to be deleted. Court approves. Guilty plea. Court reviews plea quest. and constitutional rights.  Court accepts plea. Factual basis. Court finds guilty. Court reviews voting and firearms rights. DNA sample already done, DNA surcharge still ordered. Court accepts agreement.
2 yrs prison, 1 yr initial confinement, 1 yr extended supervision, AODA, costs. Concurrent to all other sentences. 15CM18 dismissed and read in. Postconviction rights.

Defendant Eron W. Gorr in court via video with attorney Jessica L Schuster.  Defendant Eron W. Gorr in custody.   Ralph Uttke  appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called 15CM18  Not guilty plea entered on 15CM18 and time limits waived for preliminary/  15CM18  court will entered not guilty plea.  Plea and sentencing for both files.  Bond has been set and will continue  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 25, 2015 at 10:45 am.

Defendant Eron W. Gorr in court, via video, in custody.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Def has copy of complaint.  Def waives reading of complaint.  Court reviews charge with possible penalties.  Def advised of right to an atty.  Def has contacted the public defenders office.  State request signature bond.  Def is on probation hold.  Bond set by court  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 23, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
